DOC.brief_summary: The aim research explore change peripheral/cerebrovascular function insulin sensitivity 7-day combination physical activity reduction ( -50 % step per day ) overfeeding ( +50 % kcal per day , comprise 65 % fat ) healthy male volunteer , examine whether daily intake tea prevent change .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Tea Vascular Function Insulin Sensitivity
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study explore impact 7-day 'unhealthy ' lifestyle combine physical activity reduction ( -50 % step per day ) overfeeding ( +50 % kcal per day , comprise 65 % fat ) peripheral ( conduit artery skin microvessels ) cerebrovascular function insulin sensitivity healthy male participant . Moreover , investigator explore whether detrimental impact lifestyle mitigate daily tea consumption ( equivalent 6 cups/day ) . To explore hypothesis , investigator perform measurement parameter 7-days reduce physical activity overfeeding , without combination daily tea ingestion .
DOC.criteria: Aged 1855 year Male Habitually active ( > 8,000 steps/day ) Healthy Smokers Medical history cardiovascular/metabolic disease Family history cardiovascular disease ( first degree relative ) On medication know influence cardiovascular system BMI < 18 > 30 kg/m2 Known food allergy special dietary requirement Vaccination ( < 1 week ) due induce systemic inflammatory reaction
